name: The Paradise Threat
overview: The Paradise Threat is a text adventure game for multiple systems. Taking place shortly after the events of Lucifer's Realm, the player has now died and begins their ascent to Heaven. On the way, they encounter Winston Churchill who takes the player to a meeting with other historical figures including, Groucho Marx, Gandhi, Thomas Jefferson, Abraham Lincoln, The Kennedy brothers, Martin Luther, and Abraham Lincoln. There they explain that after giving Satan the Magical Crown, Hitler's Rebel Army was driven from hell. They have used the power of the Deecula Statue to invade Heaven. Only the player has the power to find and destroy the statue to save the souls of Heaven. The player enters all commands via VERB NOUN entries, and there is a save and restore feature available.
